name: Legal Question Answering
short_description: Answer multiple-choice questions about legal concepts and rules.
long_description: This task tests models on their understanding of legal concepts, doctrines, and rules through multiple-choice questions. Questions are drawn from bar exam prep materials, law school courses, and legal treatises, covering topics like constitutional law, torts, contracts, and criminal procedure.
paper_title: LegalQA: A Comprehensive Benchmark for Legal Understanding
